item.title: Cross debug kernel using qemu-system
item.description: From this post, our goal is tracing the execution procedure from kernel entry to userspace process (busybox init) by using qemu-system and gdb-multiarch. Preparation qemu-system-arm Compile it from source code or just use sudo apt install qemu-system-arm. kernel Linux kernel v4.1 for armel as an example. Compiling a linux kernel requires a matched version of gcc. For example, the linux kernel v4.1 requires the gcc version between 3 and 5:
